Title: Queen Death
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Beau DeMayo, Carina Adly MacKenzie (executive story editor), K.C. Perry (story editor), Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: When The Hollow sends a terrifying message to Vincent, he must team with Haley and Freya to embark on a desperate mission to stop the Hollow once and for all - even if it requires a heartbreaking sacrifice.
